TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi IncludeRegex extends System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex

Docs.summary: Provides a regular expression to parse an ASP.NET directive.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The IncludeRegex class provides a regular expression to parse an ASP.NET `#include` directive (`<!-- #include file="``filename.ext``" -->`).
> [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.RegularExpressions> classes are used internally by the .NET Framework to parse ASP.NET pages.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
